message: I propose dividing the $10000 with an 80/20 split in favor of Alice. This offers a significant portion for both parties.
I think 60/40 is a fair split. I'm willing to give you a significant portion, but I want a bit more for myself.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 72/28 split. This maintains a substantial amount for both of us while accounting for the decrease in value of money over time.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. This split should be more acceptable to you, considering the inflation.
